prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: A particular set of circumstances led to her being adopted by Mr. Wright. A world-class magician on the rise.
Character 1
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She apparently studied psychology in Europe.
Character 2
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: My boss. He taught me a lot about what it means to be a lawyer.
Character 3
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A prosecutor from Khura'in. He's also a monk, which explains why he's known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 4
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons, and the man who raised me. He was a lawyer once.
Character 5
Name: Archie Buff
Description: An archeologist in Kurain Village. He was asked by someone to study the Founder's Orb.
Character 6
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: A member of the Defiant Dragons, and Dhurke's right-hand man. He's always been one to laugh at just about anything.
Character 7
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective. It looks like she finally became the forensics investigator she always wanted to be.
Character 8
Name: Paul Atishon
Description: He's looking to represent Kurain Village. His remarkable self-confidence is blinding.
Character 9
Name: Sergeant Buff → Armie Buff
Description: The doctor's reclusive child. He lost his mother in a fire.
Character 10
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ms. Maya Fey's cousin. She's also one of Kurain Village's spirit mediums. She's always really courteous.
Character 11
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: Mr. Wright's best friend and the district's chief prosecutor. His frilly cravat makes a strong fashion statement.
Character 12
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mr. Wright's former assistant. She's currently training in Khura'in. I'm told she can channel the dead.
Character 13
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice and the kingdom's second-in-command.
Character 14
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: Daughter of Ga'ran and princess of Khura'in who is more than a little spoiled.
Character 15
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 16
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 17
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Character 18
Name: Amara Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The previous queen. She is a spirit medium known as the grand priestess and possesses incredible spiritual power.
Character 19
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: An aspiring magician and my daughter. I adopted her nine years ago.
Character 20
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The newest lawyer in my office with a background in psychology.
Character 21
Name: Apollo Justice
Description: A reliable subordinate at my office. Serious and hot-blooded with vocal chords made of steel.
Character 22
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A Khura'inese prosecutor and monk. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 23
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons and Apollo's adoptive father.
Character 24
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: The Defiant Dragons' XO and Dhurke's right-hand man. He will laugh at just about anything.
Character 25
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective with a love of science. She's finally achieved her dream of becoming a forensics investigator.
Character 26
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend. We used to go head-to-head back in his courtroom days.
Character 27
Name: Maya Fey
Description: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.
Character 28
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice. He was killed during the hostage exchange.
Character 29
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last memories of the dead.
Character 30
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 31
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 32
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My beloved attorney's badge. Wearing it gets me raring to go.
Evidence 1
Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6
Name: Orb Transfer Agreement
Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: The police have had their eye on Dr. Buff for some time.
Person: Ema
Testimony 1
Testimony: And just today, a number of stolen artifacts were discovered in his study.
Person: Ema
Testimony 2
Testimony: Among them were a priceless urn and a statue that were stolen from the Fey clan.
Person: Ema
Testimony 3
Testimony: It seems the doctor would do anything to study artifacts, including steal them.
Person: Ema
Testimony 4
Testimony: As for the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence.
Person: Ema

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Evidence 3 ("Study Photo") states that Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder, implying that Datz was involved in suspicious activity at that time. However, Ema's Testimony 4 states that "he likely stole it from the Atishon residence," referring to Dr. Buff stealing the relic, suggesting that Dr. Buff, not Datz, is the suspect who stole the relic.

This creates a contradiction regarding who is implicated in the theft related to the relic. Evidence 3 suggests Datz's involvement, while Testimony 4 points to Dr. Buff being the likely thief.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: That evening, I was walking alone, lost in thought.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 1
Testimony: I passed by the doctor's house... and that's when I saw Mr. Are'bal.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 2
Testimony: I was under this tree when I saw Mr. Are'bal.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 3
Testimony: He was running out the front door.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 4
Testimony: I had no idea Dr. Buff was dead. That's why I didn't call the police.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 5
Testimony: It was around 10 at night. Surely that must've been him fleeing the scene of his crime.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 6
Testimony: A vote for me is a vote to end such violence. That is my promise to you!
Person: Atishon

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Evidence 3 (Study Photo) states that Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. It also mentions that the victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass, covered by books.

Testimony 4 (Atishon) says, "I had no idea Dr. Buff was dead. That's why I didn't call the police." 

These two contradict each other because if Atishon saw Datz fleeing the crime scene, he must have known the doctor was dead or at least suspected a crime had occurred. However, in the testimony, he claims ignorance of the death at that moment, which contradicts the observation noted in the evidence.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Papa met with someone the night he died.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 1
Testimony: I didn't have eyes on the ground, as I'd already mounted my siege defense, but...
Person: Sarge
Testimony 2
Testimony: ...I did hear him arguing with someone in his study!
Person: Sarge
Testimony 3
Testimony: From my window, I saw the one designated "Datz" getting ejected from the premises.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 4
Testimony: After that, the man lingered around the perimeter for some time.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 5
Testimony: He must have regrouped and killed my papa in the study later -- I just know it!
Person: Sarge

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Evidence 3 (Study Photo) states: "Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder," meaning Datz fled soon after the murder.

Testimony 3 by Sarge says: "From my window, I saw the one designated 'Datz' getting ejected from the premises." This suggests Sarge observed Datz leaving, but does not specify the timing related to the murder.

Evidence 3 implies Datz fled directly from the murder scene, but Testimony 4 from Sarge says: "After that, the man lingered around the perimeter for some time" and Testimony 5: "He must have regrouped and killed my papa in the study later -- I just know it!", implying the murder happened after Datz's leaving.

Thus, there is a contradiction: Evidence 3 suggests Datz fled after the murder, while Sarge's testimonies suggest Datz was ejected before the murder occurred.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: It was around 11 at night, and I was out on a mobile meet-and-greet around the village.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 1
Testimony: That's when I saw Dr. Buff being murdered from outside his study window!
Person: Atishon
Testimony 2
Testimony: Mr. Are'bal snuck up from behind and struck him on the head.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 3
Testimony: The doctor was standing in front of the bookshelves, absorbed in a book.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 4
Testimony: His weapon of choice: a suitcase.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 5
Testimony: A big, strong man like him could easily swing a heavy suitcase into someone's head.
Person: Atishon

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Evidence 3 (Study Photo) shows the victim lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass, covered by books. Testimony 1 states that Atishon saw Dr. Buff being murdered from outside his study window around 11 PM. However, Evidence 13 (Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report) states the time of death is between 10 and 11 PM. If the autopsy report says the time of death is between 10 and 11 PM, but Atishon saw the murder happening at around 11 PM, there is a contradiction in the timing of the murder.

However, focusing on the evidence and testimony provided, the strongest contradiction comes from Testimony 2 and 4 compared to the evidence:

Testimony 2 says Mr. Are'bal snuck up from behind and struck Dr. Buff on the head.
Testimony 4 states the weapon was a suitcase.
Evidence 13 shows death caused by being struck with the corner of some object, which could fit being hit with a suitcase.
But Evidence 3 and Testimony 3 state the doctor was standing in front of the bookshelves, absorbed in a book. This contradicts Testimony 2 which says Are'bal sneaked up from behind suggesting the attack was from behind.

Since this is less clear, let's look at the exact contradiction:

Testimony 1: Atishon claims to have seen Dr. Buff being murdered from outside his study window around 11 PM.
Evidence 13: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report states time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
The contradiction is that if the death happened before 11 PM, would Atishon be able to see the murder around 11 PM?

Since the testimony is "around 11 at night" and the autopsy time is between 10 and 11, this may be a close call but not a strict contradiction.

Another contradiction:

Testimony 2: Mr. Are'bal snuck up from behind and struck him on the head.
Testimony 3: The doctor was standing in front of the bookshelves.
According to Evidence 4 (Study Diagram), the bookshelf is opposite the large window. If the attacker snuck up from behind, it would be behind the doctor relative to the window.

But Testimony 1 says Atishon saw the murder from outside the window, seeing Dr. Buff being murdered.

This suggests that the attacker was visible from outside.

So if the doctor was standing in front of the bookshelf, with the attacker sneaking up behind him, and Atishon saw the murder from outside the window, the attacker should be visible from outside.

But if the bookshelf is located away from the window, the attacker would be out of Atishon's line of sight.

Therefore, Testimony 1 (Atishon seeing the murder from outside the window) contradicts Testimony 2 (Mr. Are'bal sneaking from behind).

Thus, the best evidence and testimony contradiction pair is:

- Evidence 3: Photo showing the victim lying next to the window.
- Testimony 2: Mr. Are'bal snuck up from behind.
- Testimony 1: Atishon saw the murder from outside the window.

The contradiction is between Testimony 1 and Testimony 2.

However, since the prompt requires one evidence and one testimony, choose Evidence 3 (Study Photo) and Testimony 2 (Mr. Are'bal snuck up from behind), as the photo and testimony about the positions contradict each other.
